name: electrify
effect: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.
